div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 155px; margin-left: 427px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 32px; margin-left: 268px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
对偶，u(x)= min v(p,m)
s.t. px=m

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 262px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
间接效用函数
v(p,m) = max u(x)
s.t. px=m

switch.text: 间接效用函数v(p,m) = max u(x)...

div.div:
支出函数
e(p,u) = min px
s.t. u(x)≥u

div.div:
谢泼德引理
或者说
直接从最小化
问题中求出

switch.text: 谢泼德引理或者说直接从最小化问题中求出...

div.div:
直接
货币度量效用函数
m(p,x)=e[p,u(x)]

switch.text: 直接货币度量效用函数m(p,x)=e[p,u(x)]...

div.div:
丢弃含有 p 的项
得到 v(q,m)

switch.text: 丢弃含有 p 的项...

间接
货币度量效用函数
μ(p;q,m)=e[p,v(q,m)]
